runs.comm: beaten outside off stump. It held its line and Akmal pushed inside the line. He then goes down for bit of gardening.
tails in towards middle stump, Akmal goes back to work it to backward square leg
full in length, moving in towards off stump, around 132 kmph, Shahzaib leans forward to defend

leading edge but it lands safely. It landed around the off and middle before curving away, Shahzaib tried to flick it through the on side but was beaten by the movement and got a thick leading edge but it falls well beyond mid-off's reach. Good start by Rankin here.
on the middle and this one curves in, pushed to the on side for a single
back of length, moving in towards off stump, chopped to backward point
full and swinging away but it starts from well outside off and Shahzaib watches it sail past him
fullish and outside off, Shahzaib leans forward to thump it over extra-cover for the first boundary of the day
in the zone outside off, left alone
full and straight on the middle, gets forward to push it back down the track
straightens outside off stump, steered to cover point
Full again, hint of away movement, Shahzaib lunges out to scoop it up and it falls just over mid-off before running to the boundary.
length delivery around the off stump, defended to point
lands on a length, moves in towards middle, defended to the on side of the pitch
cut and a miss. It kicked up from back of length, held its line outside off, Akmal went back and across, tried to cut it but didn't connect
length delivery homing in on the off stump, Akmal gets right behind it to push it gently to the off side
high bouncer just outside off stump, Akmal goes for the pull but can't connect. It flew past the helmet.
bouncing delivery on the middle, Akmal shuffles across to fend it away to short fine-leg region
fuller, around the off stump, guided to point. Another fine over from Rankin.
the keeper Niall O'Brien is standing up to the stumps now. Sliding towards pads, Akmal tries to whip it away, misses and is struck on the pad
catch it was the cry but the ball falls short of mid-on. Akmal pulled the back-of-length delivery from outside off. Weak shot.
And he breaks free now. Nothing weak about this. It was full and moving in towards leg stump, he cleared the front foot and swung it high over square leg boundary.
goes for the slower one, slows down the pace but it slips out of his hand and it's a full toss at the face of Akmal who does well to swat it past square leg
The pick-up shot over square leg is in business this over. First Akmal, now Shahzaib. He leaned forward to chip it from the middle stump.
Johnson switches the line to the off stump but can't escape punishment as Shahzaib lifts it over wide midwicket region. The bottom-hand working overtime.

better, bigger and it's a six folks! Superbly hit. It was full around the off and middle, Shahzaib moved forward, got that bottom-hand working again and sent the ball soaring over long-on boundary for a thrilling six
rotates the strike with a hit to square leg
cuts in towards middle and leg, around 139 kmph, runs away off the pad for a leg bye
short in length, around 137 kmph, just outside off, Akmal stays beside the line to cut it down to wide third man
138.9 kmph bouncing delivery from short of length, Shahzaib gets into a tangle as he tries to shuffle across and work it to the on side. In the end, he edges it to his pad
138.7 kmph bouncer that flashes past the attempted pull and Niall O'Brien leaps to bring it back to earth
very ambitious on-the-up drive attempted and the ball rushes past the inside edge to the keeper. It kicked up even as it came in and Shahzaib tried to knife it on the up
full in length and on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
fuller, on the middle, takes out his front leg from the line and drives it down to long-on
good yorker on the middle, Shahzaib gets his bat down in a hurry to keep it out

holes out to mid-off. That penchant to drive on the up, using his bottom-hand has done him in. It was a length delivery coming in around the off stump, Shahzaib leaned forward and tried to scoop it on-the-up but couldn't clear mid-off
on the middle stump, turned to short fine-leg
yorker length on the off stump, driven to cover
flighted around the off stump, driven to sweeper cover
tossed outside off stump, Akmal crashes it inside-out to drill it past the diving extra-cover fielder. Superbly struck.
reprises that stroke though with lesser power this time.
on the middle stump and swept to right of short fine-leg for a single
flighted full, lands just short of blockhole, Afridi takes out his front leg from the line and flicks the ball towards deep midwicket
slows up the pace, shortens the length, and drags it outside off, hit away for a single
slower one outside off stump, full as well, Afridi waited on the front foot before driving it uppishly but well clear of the extra-cover fielder
shotrt in length, tailing in, turned to short fine-leg for a single
full toss on the middle and leg, Akmal lunges towards off to paddle-scoop it over short fine-leg for another boundary.
slips in a slower one outside off, Akmal waits before square driving it to deep point region
full pitched outside off stump, driven crisply to left of long-off for couple of runs.
another slower one, on the middle and leg this time, Afridi calmly wrists it to deep backward square leg. 14 runs in the over.
low full toss, driven to long-off for a single.
flighted full, slower in the air, turned towards deep midwicket and they run hard to come back for the second run
quicker, flatter, fuller, around off stump, pushed to cover
Afridiiii! He dances down the track and flays the flighted delivery straight over the bowler's head. One bounce and over the ropes. He hit that really straight. Safe hit.
short outside off stump, cut away to deep point region for a single
slips it down the leg side, Akmal tries to sweep but doesn't connect
flighted full toss on the middle, Akmal punches it hard to right of extra cover where a fine diving stop prevents at least two if not three runs
comes down the track but perhaps got too close to the ball and drives to long-off
He lunges to the off side to pick the flighted delivery from outside off stump and swings it to deep square leg boundary

But he is gone now. He was lured by the flight and moved down the track but the ball was slower than he thought and dipped on him quickly. He had to wait a touch for it to arrive but could only hit it straight to long-on
loopy delivery on the middle, lunges forward to push it to midwicket
leans forward to drive through the off side
length delivery on the middle, pushed to the on side of the pitch and Johnston lunges to his right to stop
short in length, around the off stump, forced away to backward point who has a shy at the hon-striker's end and gives away the overthrows.
full in length, on the leg and middle, flicked to deep backward square leg
the slow bouncer on the middle stump line, Younis was made to wait and he waited patiently before pulling it hard to deep backward square-leg boundary
so he goes fuller this time and Younis drives to long-on
very deftly played late-cut. It was moving in towards the middle and off stump, Akmal stayed adjacent to the line, opened the bat-face and guided it through the vacant slip region.
swept away for a single
pauses before release, floats it on the off stump, Akmal backs away to cut it to deep backward point
slows up the pace this time, defended towards midwicket
fuller, on the middle, driven to long-on
tossed full outside off and Younis plays his favourite sweep shot for a single
runs down the track for the big hit but yorks himself in the process and edges the ball to his foot
tapped to backward point
curves in towards middle, Younis shuffles across to flick it to deep midwicket
flighted full outside off stump, Akmal thrashes it to wide long-on boundary. He didn't step down, just leaned forward to lift it
steers this through cover point

lovely delivery to clean up Younis. It was flighted a bit more, it drifted towards leg and middle, luring Younis to go for the slog sweep but the ball dipped and it went past the swing of the bat to crash into the stumps
lunges forward to work it to the on side, misses but will take the leg  bye
flighted on the middle and off line, slow through the air, turned to backward square leg
flatter trajectory, slow again, pushed to the on side of the pitch
quicker and flatter, backs away to chop it past point
drifts away this time, full outside off, whipped down to long-on
tosses it full outside off stump, Akmal drives inside-out to wide long-off region for couple of runs
turns in from outside off, worked to right of midwicket for a single
curving away quickly full outside off stump, Akmal shapes to square drive but edges it, slices it just over backward point
slower, lands around off stump, turns away, left alone
leans forward to push with the spin to backward point
flighted on the leg stump, runs away off the pad to midwicket region
low dipping full toss, Misbah moves outside leg before coming back to his original position and drives to long-on
flighted outside off stump, swept away for a single
paddles a length delivery from outside off to short fine-leg fielder for a single that brings up his fifty.
shuffles to the off stump, shapes to flick but gets a leading edge towards long-off
shuffles outside off again, flicks from there to midwicket
50 done, he is going for his shots now. He picked the full delivery outside off and carved it high to the extra-cover boundary
shapes to paddle but the bowler pushes it well outside off and so Akmal adjusts to guide it to third man
low full toss outside off stump and Misbah goes down on his knee to unfurl a stylish extra-cover drive and Pakistan are beginning to rattle along
moves outside leg, almost yorker length, driven to long-off
and again just short of the blockhole, pushed down towards long-on
fullish, on the middle and leg, turned to fine leg
again, that yorker length - fine over this so far - dug out to midwicket

The yorkers keep coming relentlessly and this has knocked out the middle stump. Akmal had to go for the big hit - this is the 17th over - and he charged down the track but the ball squeezed under the bat and cleaned up the middle stick
full and straight again, can only push it back to Johnston. Superb over this, he held his nerve well to keep slipping in yorkers
Fasten your belts. Here comes the first big hit in the slog overs. Misbah swung a full toss way into the long-on stands.
slows up the pace now and that works to upset Misbah's timing and he drags it to midwicket
very full again, driven to long-on

oh a lovey delivery to remove Misbah. He really really slowed up the pace on that and Misbah was way early into the slog sweep and ended up lobbing it up on the off side and Niall rushed to his right to take it. What a lovely change of pace.
again slow through the air and it drifts away outside off, Malik is down the wicket but he has to wait and wait and he can only push it back to the bowler
flatter, a tad quicker, driven to long-on
moves outside off, Rankin keeps his cool and hurls it further outside off and it rushes past the outside edge
can't quite time his whack across the line and ends up swatting it towards mid-off
length delivery around the off stump, steered to backward point region
ah the bouncer and that surprises Malik who yanks his head off the line and tries to swat it away but can't connect
fuller, straighter, Malik mistimes the drive towards long-on ... another tight over from Rankin, who has bowled really well today
full pitched on the middle stump, Razzaq drives but Rankin gets his right boot to it and the ball deflects towards mid-off. Rankin completes his nagging spell. Well bowled.
full and on the middle stump, just short of the blockhole, dragged to deep midwicket
low full toss on the middle, dipping, Malik moves outside leg and punches it to long-off
Razzaq goes down town. Big hit. 96 metres. Full in length and Razzaq goes straight over the bowler. Up up and over.
heaves this length delivery to wide long-on region
yorker length on the middle, mistimes the hit towards long-on but Malik runs hard to push for the second run
again just short of the blockhole, heaved to long-on for a single.
